alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Fayette; Franklin; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 14 at 9:41AM EDT until October 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR WESTERN OHIO, EASTERN INDIANA AND NORTH CENTRAL KENTUCKY... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 034 Mercer, Fire Weather Zone 035 Auglaize, Fire Weather Zone 042 Darke, Fire Weather Zone 043 Shelby, Fire Weather Zone 050 Wayne, Fire Weather Zone 051 Miami, Fire Weather Zone 058 Fayette IN, Fire Weather Zone 059 Union IN, Fire Weather Zone 060 Preble, Fire Weather Zone 061 Montgomery, Fire Weather Zone 066 Franklin IN, Fire Weather Zone 070 Butler, Fire Weather Zone 073 Ripley, Fire Weather Zone 074 Dearborn, Fire Weather Zone 075 Ohio, Fire Weather Zone 077 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 080 Switzerland, Fire Weather Zone 089 Carroll, Fire Weather Zone 090 Gallatin, Fire Weather Zone 091 Boone, Fire Weather Zone 092 Kenton, Fire Weather Zone 093 Campbell, Fire Weather Zone 094 Owen, Fire Weather Zone 095 Grant and Fire Weather Zone 096 Pendleton. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 22 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Avoid burning. Conditions are favorable for rapid fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Dearborn; Fayette; Franklin; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland; Union; Wayne
